/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/bin/intel64/icpc  -g   CMakeFiles/testSingleLinkageTree.dir/test.cpp.o  -o testSingleLinkageTree -Wl,-rpath,/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib:/opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/release_mt /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin/libiomp5.so -Xlinker --enable-new-dtags -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/release_mt -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/mpi-rt/2017.0.0/intel64/lib/release_mt -Xlinker -rpath -Xlinker /opt/intel/mpi-rt/2017.0.0/intel64/lib /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/libmpicxx.so /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/release_mt/libmpi.so /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mpi/intel64/lib/libmpigi.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so -lpthread
